widget.name: NewsReader
widget.description:
A sample Tabris.js application.
Sample news feed reader app using tabris.js. It's just simple.It doesn't contain hybrid app features such as bookmark, localstorage,and others. It's is just simple to show you how to create a new reader app using tabris.js and news api(only json;not xml). Used the next web api from newsAPI(https://newsapi.org).
widget.author: Frenco Jobs
